aboutTip.message: Learn about the add-on you're using right now, Twitch Fox!

version.description: The current version of Twitch Fox.

aboutTextNewUser1.description: First part of the message displayed to new users on the 'about' page.

aboutTextNewUser2.message: You can browse Twitch by clicking the tabs on the left, and search Twitch for content relating to the current tab by using the (currently not visible) search bar above. Want to quickly view and receive notifications for followed content? Click 'Log In' in the top right corner to connect with Twitch! And don't forget to check out the settings by clicking the gear icon in the top left corner, where you can disable tooltips and much more.
aboutTextNewUser2.description: Second part of the message displayed to new users on the 'about' page.

aboutTextNewUser3.message: Whether you have used Twitch Fox in the past or have downloaded it for the first time, I hope you enjoy my add-on!
aboutTextNewUser3.description: Third part of the message displayed to new users on the 'about' page.

aboutDeveloperName.description: The 'signed' name of the developer. Could also contain an indication of who translated the add-on.

aboutWhatsNewButton.message: Okay! Tell me what's new in version $VERSION$.
aboutWhatsNewButton.description: Displayed on the button that removes the new users message on the 'about' page.

aboutTextWhatsNew1.message: What's new in Twitch Fox version $VERSION$?
aboutTextWhatsNew1.description: First part of the message detailing add-on update information.

aboutTextWhatsNew2.message: (Re-) Added a dark mode and an option (on by default) to show channel logos for streams, videos, and clips. Coming soon: Followed games and Streamlink support!
aboutTextWhatsNew2.description: Second part of the message detailing add-on update information.

aboutTellMoreButton.message: Okay! Tell me more about Twitch Fox in general.
aboutTellMoreButton.description: Displayed on the button that removes the new users message on the 'about' page.

aboutTextAbout1.message: What is Twitch Fox? This is a Firefox add-on I originally made in April 2015 under the name 'Twitch Alarm,' and it has grown from a simple followed stream notifier to a full-fledged Twitch browser. I've worked on it in small and dedicated spurts when I had free time throughout the years, and I've learned a lot from developing it.
aboutTextAbout1.description: First part of the message displayed on the 'about' page detailing the add-on.

aboutTextAbout2.message: Like Twitch Fox? Please leave a review on the add-on page! If you really really like it, please consider donating. Twitch Fox is the product of many hours of free time, and any contribution is greatly appreciated! Have a problem or suggestion? Leave an issue on the GitHub page or contact me directly, and I will try to get around to fixing it. Thank you for using my add-on!
aboutTextAbout2.description: Second part of the message displayed on the 'about' page detailing the add-on.
